name: ProgestogenOnlyOrProgestinOnlyPillsPOP
title: Progestogen only or Progestin only Pills (POP)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains the use of both generic and brand name Progestogen-only or Progestin-only Pills (POP) for contraception.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have expressed the use of both generic and brand name Progestogen-only / Progestin-only Pills (POP). Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the "Medication" category, with Datatype: "Medication, Active".),(Inclusion Criteria: Contraception use that indicates active usage of both generic and brand name Progestogen-only / Progestin-only Pills (POP).),(Exclusion Criteria: There is no exclusion criteria listed for this value set.)
